help:
enable auto compaction for a database
warning: compact operation has blocking behaviour and is slow, enabling auto compact will allow compact to run on any collection at any time. You can cancel by disabling auto compact.
{ autoCompact : <bool>, [freeSpaceTargetMB:<int64_t>], [runOnce:<bool>] }
  freeSpaceTargetMB - minimum amount of space recoverable for compaction to proceed
  runOnce - executes compaction on the database only once
